mention.text: Supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei of Iran urged Pakistan on Monday to avoid wicked U.S. influence and build stronger ties with Tehran , blaming Washington for rising sectarian violence in the Iranian-Pakistani border region that has strained relations
a recent spate of kidnappings and cross-border raids in Iran 's easternmost province of Sistan-Baluchistan that have generally been claimed by Jaish al-Adl -LRB- Army of Justice -RRB- rebels
Jaish al-Adl -LRB- Army of Justice -RRB- rebels
his first official visit to Iran
